item.title: about
item.description: 👩🏻‍💻🐰🕳️ I’m a software engineer who loves writing code, investigating tricky bugs down rabbit holes and helping others above all things. 📚🧮 I have a background in theoretical computer science although I wanted to study pure mathematics. 💬🗺️ I’m a polyglot at heart, trying to be a polyglot on the outside as well. I like learning different programming languages, even in absurd ways, and different human languages as well. 🇫🇷🇩🇪 Besides Spanish (my native language) and English, I speak French and German, more or less.
